oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ON NEGATIVE BINOMIAL APPROXIMATION
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: VELLAISAMY, P
UPADHYE, NS
CEKANAVICIUS, V
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: negative binomial distribution
negative binomial perturbation
Stein's method
total variation norm
COMPOUND POISSON APPROXIMATION
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper deals with negative binomial approximation to sums of independent Z(+)-valued random variables. Stein's method is employed to obtain the error bounds. Convolution of negative binomial and Poisson distribution is used as a three-parametric approximation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: THEORY OF PROBABILITY AND ITS APPLICATIONS, 57(1)97-109
